name: October
description:
Photorealistic game about a journalist investigating a year old case, explore and uncover the secrets of the school. You will find 13+ unique drawings, 12+ articles and notes revealing the plot, interesting gameplay moments.


The size of the game is 3+ gigabytes, so the archive will contain a link to google disk, where the archive with the game is stored.
